channel.title: CVE Feed for Softneta -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Softneta -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-40150|2024-08-02T18:24:55.602Z -- softneta -- meddream%20pacs
item.description: Softneta MedDream PACS does not perform an authentication check and performs some dangerous functionality, which could result in unauthenticated remote code execution.0

item.title: CVE-2023-39227|2024-08-02T18:02:06.660Z -- softneta -- meddream%20pacs
item.description: ​Softneta MedDream PACS stores usernames and passwords in plaintext. The plaintext storage could be abused by attackers to leak legitimate user’s credentials.
